title: Research Work - Automatic Plant Detection
description: Conducted academic research on 'Automatic Plant Species Recognition Technique Using Machine Learning Approaches,' developing a functional prototype and contributing to a research paper presented at CoCoNet'15, IEEE. The work was subsequently published in IEEE Xplore (https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/7411268), showcasing expertise in machine learning and computer vision applications.

title: Oracle Certified Associate
description: Earned Oracle Certified Associate, Java SE 8 Programmer certification with a score of 92% in May 2017, demonstrating advanced proficiency in Java programming fundamentals and object-oriented design principles.
